com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.ruleset

Class RuleSetVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.ruleset.RuleSetVerifier
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultRulSetVerifier

    public abstract class RuleSetVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
    RuleSetVerifier is made to verify that all classifications and metrics used inside a RuleSet file are defined and available in LaunchSetup.input_class_file and LaunchSetup.input_metric_file.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    24/08/2013
    Author:
    Khaled Bakhit

      • RuleSetVerifier

        public RuleSetVerifier(boolean autoCorrect)
                throws InvalidInputException
        RuleSetVerifier constructor. Uses the default LaunchSetup Object.
        Parameters:
        autoCorrect - True to activate auto-correct, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Input files are invalid.
        See Also:
        Program.getInstance(), Program.getLaunchSetup()
